cluster modeconfiguration for KafkaUse the following requirements to configure a cluster mode pipeline to read from a Kafka cluster:
Verify the installation of Kafka, Spark Streaming, and YARN.
Install the on a Spark and YARN gateway node.
In the pipeline properties, on the General tab, set the Execution Mode property to Cluster.
In the pipeline, use a Kafka Consumer origin for cluster mode.
If you have more than one Kafka stage library installed, select the cluster mode stage library on the General tab of the origin. When you add a partition to the Kafka topic, restart the pipeline to enable the to generate a new worker to read from the new partition.
